categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Sele was a Human female who served as a quartermaster in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the Battle of Ilum, she was stationed in the Imperial base camp.
Quartermaster Sele first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as a Stims vendor on Ilum for the Empire.
